title: Configure Docker Compose for local dev
description: Verify docker-compose.yml works. Test: db starts with pgvector, backend connects, frontend runs. Add .env.example.

title: Phase 1: MVP - Working Directory
description: Build the minimum viable product with manual resource entry, basic search, and admin review queue.

title: Build resource detail page
description: Create /resource/[id] page showing: title, description, eligibility, how to apply, contact info, trust signals (last verified, source).

title: Phase 0: Project Scaffolding
description: Set up the foundational structure for Vibe4Vets - Docker, database schema, CI/CD, and connector interface.

title: Build admin review queue
description: Create /admin/review page with: pending resources list, approve/reject actions, notes field. Add basic auth protection.

title: Set up GitHub Actions CI
description: Create CI workflow: lint (ruff), type check (mypy), tests (pytest). Add frontend checks: eslint, tsc.

title: Build search UI with filters
description: Create search page with: search bar, category filters, state dropdown, results grid. Use shadcn components. Mobile responsive.

title: Implement trust scoring service
description: Create backend/app/services/trust.py with: calculate_trust_score(), detect_risky_change(), freshness decay logic. Add tests.

title: Implement full-text search
description: Add Postgres full-text search to search.py endpoint. Create GIN index on resources. Support filtering by category, state, scope.

title: Set up Alembic migrations
description: Initialize Alembic for database migrations. Create initial migration for all models (Organization, Location, Resource, Source, SourceRecord, ReviewState, ChangeLog). Add pgvector extension.

title: Seed initial resources manually
description: Add 10-20 verified resources across categories: 5 employment, 5 housing, 5 training, 5 legal. Use official VA/DOL sources.

title: Add core taxonomy definitions
description: Create backend/app/core/taxonomy.py with CATEGORIES, SUBCATEGORIES, and helper functions. Define: employment, training, housing, legal with subcategories.

title: Implement Resource CRUD API
description: Complete the resources.py endpoints: list with pagination/filtering, get by ID, create, update, delete. Add Pydantic schemas for request/response.
